name: Vi
greetingText: An artist, a simp, a gods slayer and ofc SENPAI
wishText: May the happines always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Count your life by smiles, not tears. Count your age by friends, not years.A wish for you on your birthday, whatever you ask may you receive, whatever you seek may you find, whatever you wish may it be fulfilled on your birthday and always.Hope you always remember This big devil/bear
